<title level="2" right="Creature 15">[Scarlet Triad Enforcer](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1579)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="LE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #149: Against the Scarlet Triad](/Sources.aspx?ID=14) pg. 41</row>

**Perception** +25

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Osiriani](/Languages.aspx?ID=40)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +30, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +28, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +27, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +25, [Underworld Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +26

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +8

**Dex** +6

**Con** +6

**Int** +3

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +5
</row>

**Items**
_+2 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [composite shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=75)_, [good manacles](/Equipment.aspx?ID=32), _[moderate healing potion](/Equipment.aspx?ID=186)_, _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [sap](/Weapons.aspx?ID=37)_, _+2 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [scimitar](/Weapons.aspx?ID=38)_, _+2 [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [studded leather armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=5)_

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 36 

**Fort** +30 

**Ref** +26 

**Will** +24 

</row>

**HP** 275

**Stunning Retort** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** An enemy critically fails a Strike against the enforcer; **Effect** The enforcer Strikes with their sap against that enemy if they're within reach; otherwise, the enforcer attempts an [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) check to [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=53) that enemy.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_scimitar_ +32 ([Forceful](/Traits.aspx?ID=180), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194)),
**Damage** 3d6+15 slashing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_sap_ +32 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188)),
**Damage** 2d6+15 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_composite shortbow_ +31 ([deadly 1d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Propulsive](/Traits.aspx?ID=191), [range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 2d6+12 piercing

**Dual Abuse** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The enforcer uses the pain of one attack as an opening to deal a devastating second blow. The enforcer makes two attacks against the same target: a scimitar Strike and sap Strike (in any order) or two composite shortbow Strikes. If both attacks hit, the second attack deals an additional 3d6 damage, and the enforcer gives the target one of the following conditions until the end of the enforcer's next turn: [dazzled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=7), [enfeebled 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13), [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16), or [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35). This counts as two attacks when calculating the enforcer's multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until after both attacks.

**Efficient Capture** <actions string="Three Actions" /> ([Attack](/Traits.aspx?ID=15), [Manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) **Requirements** The enforcer has [manacles](/Equipment.aspx?ID=32) in hand and is adjacent to a creature; **Effect** The enforcer attempts to bind the creature's wrists or ankles with the manacles. If the enforcer succeeds at an attack roll with a +30 modifier against the target's AC, they apply the manacles.

</column>
name: Scarlet Triad Enforcer
